did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.origination:
Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America (ACWA);
New York Clothing Manufacturers' Exchange
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photocopy of first contract between the New York Joint Board of the Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America and the New York Clothing Manufacturers' Exchange, signed in 1924, as well as a letter of transmittal from Sidney Orenstein to Jack Sheinkman from 1994.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a photocopy of first contract between the New York Joint Board of the Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America and the New York Clothing Manufacturers' Exchange, signed in 1924, and a letter of transmittal from Sidney Orenstein to Jack Sheinkman from 1994.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America. Joint Board of the Childrens Clothing Workers--Archives.
Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America. New York Joint Board--Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ACWA Collective Bargaining Agreement #5973m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
